title: 2020 Toyota Tundra Platinum 1794 Edition 4X4 5.7L V8
item_description:
2020 Toyota Tundra Platinum 1794 Edition 4X4 5.7L V8

Specifications

  • Year: 2020
  • Make: Toyota
  • Model: Tundra
  • VIN: 5TFAY5F11LX927952
  • License: 49597M3
    • Registration Expiration: 5/31/2025
  • Odometer Reads: 74,185 (will increase after smog)
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 7,200 Lbs
  • Drive Type: AWD/4WD
  • Engine: 5.7L V8 DOHC 32V

  • Transmission: 6-Speed Automatic
  • Tire Size: LT275/70R18

Note: This vehicle was repossessed by the Bank; the Certificate of Title, Certificate of Repossession, Transfer Form, and smog certificate will be mailed within 1 week after pickup. Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the transfer, registration, taxes, and fees due to DMV.
